coreAttributes.name: assless chaps
coreAttributes.description: These leather chaps are missing a large piece at the rear, which leaves the wearer's ass completely exposed.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the assless chaps, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the assless chaps, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the assless chaps, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] assless chaps, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] assless chaps, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] assless chaps, before yanking them off.
